page.title: 11THE SHROPSHIRE UNION CANAL
page.content: THE CANAL THAT RUNS THROUGH OUR AREA STARTS IN LLANGOLLEN AND IS THE SHROP SHIRE UNION CANAL.IT GOES THROUGH INTO THE MIDLANDS AND ALSO TO ELLESMERE PORT.THERE IS AN AQUEDUCTIN FRONCYSYLL TE WHICH WAS BUILT IN 1803 BY THOMAS TELFORD.IT IS OVER 1000 FEET LONG AND 121 FEET ABOVE THE RIVER DEE.IT CARR IED COAL,STEEL,CLAY AND BRICKS THAT USED TO BE MINED AND MADE IN OUR AREA. THE CANAL IS NOT USED FOR CARRYING COAL OR CLAY,IT IS USED FOR HOLIDAY BARGES.THE CANAL IS 15 FEET WIDE AND 4 FEET DEEP.THE PEOPLE HOLIDAYING ON THE CANAL CAME FROM CARLISLE,KENT,CORNWALL ,STAFFORD,LINCOLN AND EVEN AUSTRALIA. THEY WERE ON THE CANAL FOR PEACE AND QUIET AND TO SEE WILDLIFE,AND TO ENJOY THE COUNTRYSIDE.EVERYONE ENJOYED THEIR HOLIDAY.
